title: # 523 - Bret Ernst & ME
itunes:title: # 523 - Bret Ernst & ME
description:
Today, I sit down to share a bottle with comedian, Bret Ernst. We talk about the comedy store in 2000, our “frat house show”, divorce, his new special, and much more!

 

Check out his full special “Domesticated Animal” on YouTube here:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qZmwV-gEIYs 

 

Follow Bret

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/breternst   

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BretErnst 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
